q0cx01: SELECT [MstCustomer].[Id] AS [Id],[MstCustomer].[Customer],[MstCustomer].[Address],[MstCustomer].[ContactNumber],[EntryUser].[FullName] AS [EntryUser], [MstCustomer].[EntryDateTime], [UpdateUser].[FullName] AS [UpdateUser],[MstCustomer].[UpdateDateTime],[MstCustomer].[IsLocked],[MstCustomer].[CustomerCode] FROM [MstCustomer] INNER JOIN [MstUser] AS [EntryUser] ON [EntryUser].Id = [MstCustomer].[EntryUserId] LEFT JOIN [MstUser] AS [UpdateUser] ON [UpdateUser].Id = [MstCustomer].UpdateUserId
q0cx04: SELECT TOP 1 [CustomerCode] FROM [MstCustomer] ORDER BY [Id] DESC
q0cx07: SELECT [TrnSales].[SalesDate], [TrnSales].[SalesNumber], [TrnSales].[Id], [TrnSales].[Amount], [TrnSales].[PaidAmount], [TrnSales].[CreditAmount], [TrnSales].[DebitAmount], [TrnSales].[BalanceAmount], [TrnSales].[IsLocked], [TrnSales].[IsCancelled] FROM  [TrnSales] INNER JOIN [MstCustomer] ON [MstCustomer].[Id]=[TrnSales].[Id] WHERE [TrnSales].[IsLocked]=1 AND [TrnSales].[IsCancelled]=0 AND [TrnSales].[Id]= @Id ORDER BY [TrnSales].[SalesDate] DESC
q0cx09: SELECT [MstAccount].[Id], [MstAccount].[Account], [MstAccount].[AccountType] FROM [MstAccount] WHERE [MstAccount].[Account] IS NOT NULL AND [MstAccount].[AccountType]='ASSET' ORDER BY [MstAccount].[Account]

q0dx01: SELECT [MstDiscount].[Id], [MstDiscount].[Discount], [MstDiscount].[DiscountRate],[EntryUser].[FullName] AS [EntryUser],[MstDiscount].[EntryDateTime],[UpdateUser].[FullName] AS [UpdateUser], [MstDiscount].[UpdateDateTime],[MstDiscount].[IsLocked],[MstDiscount].[DiscountCode] FROM [MstDiscount] INNER JOIN [MstUser] AS [EntryUser] ON [EntryUser].[Id] = [MstDiscount].[EntryUserId] LEFT JOIN [MstUser] AS [UpdateUser] ON [UpdateUser].[Id] = [MstDiscount].[UpdateUserId]

q0dx03: SELECT TOP 1 [DiscountCode] FROM [MstDiscount] ORDER BY [Id] DESC

q0dix01: SELECT [MstDiscountItem].*, [MstItem].[ItemCode], [MstItem].[ItemDescription] FROM [MstDiscountItem] INNER JOIN [MstItem] ON [MstItem].[Id]= [MstDiscountItem].[ItemId] WHERE [DiscountId] = @DiscountId

q0dix07: SELECT * FROM [MstDiscountItem] WHERE [DiscountId] IS NULL OR [DiscountId] = 0
q0dix08: SELECT [Id] FROM [MstDiscountItem] WHERE [Id] <> @Id AND ([DiscountId] IS NULL AND [ItemId] = @ItemId)
q0ix01: SELECT [MstItem].[Id], [MstItem].[ItemCode], [MstItem].[BarCode], [MstItem].[ItemDescription] ,[MstItem].[Category], [MstUnit].[Unit] ,[MstItem].[Price] ,[MstItem].[ImagePath] ,[MstItem].[OnhandQuantity] ,[MstItem].[IsInventory], [EntryUser].[FullName] AS [EntryUser] , [MstItem].[EntryDateTime] ,[UpdateUser].[FullName] AS [UpdateUser] ,[MstItem].[UpdateDateTime], [MstItem].[IsLocked] FROM [MstItem] INNER JOIN [MstUnit]  ON [MstUnit].[Id] = [MstItem].[UnitId] INNER JOIN [MstUser] AS [EntryUser] ON [EntryUser].[Id] = [MstItem].[EntryUserId] LEFT JOIN [MstUser] AS [UpdateUser] ON [UpdateUser].[Id] = [MstItem].[UpdateUserId]

q0ix07: SELECT [MstItem].[Category] FROM [MstItem] GROUP BY [MstItem].[Category] HAVING [MstItem].[Category] Is Not Null ORDER BY [MstItem].[Category]
q0ix09: SELECT [MstItem].[Id], [MstItem].[ItemCode], [MstItem].[BarCode],[MstItem].[ItemDescription], [MstItem].[Alias], [MstItem].[GenericName], [MstItem].[Category], [MstItem].[SalesAccountId], [MstItem].[AssetAccountId], [MstItem].[CostAccountId], [MstItem].[InTaxId], [MstItem].[OutTaxId], [MstItem].[UnitId], [MstItem].[DefaultSupplierId], [MstItem].[Cost], [MstItem].[MarkUp], [MstItem].[Price], [MstItem].[ImagePath], [MstItem].[ReorderQuantity], [MstItem].[OnhandQuantity], [MstItem].[IsInventory], [MstItem].[ExpiryDate], [MstItem].[LotNumber], [MstItem].[Remarks], [EntryUser].[FullName] AS [EntryName], [MstItem].[EntryDateTime],[UpdateUser].[FullName] AS [UpdateName], [MstItem].[UpdateDateTime], [MstItem].[IsLocked], [MstItem].[DefaultKitchenReport], [MstItem].[IsPackage], [SalesAccount].[Code] AS [SalesCode], [SalesAccount].[Account] AS [SalesAccount], [AssetAccount].[Code] AS [AssetCode], [AssetAccount].[Account] AS [AssetAccount], [CostAccount].[Code] AS [CostCode], [CostAccount].[Account] AS [CostAccount], [InTax].[Tax] AS [InTax], [OutTax].[Tax] AS [OutTax], [Unit].[Unit] AS [Unit], [Supplier].[Supplier] AS [Supplier] FROM [MstItem] INNER JOIN [MstAccount] AS [SalesAccount] ON [SalesAccount].[Id] = [MstItem].[SalesAccountId] INNER JOIN [MstAccount] AS [AssetAccount] ON [AssetAccount].[Id] = [MstItem].[AssetAccountId] INNER JOIN [MstAccount] AS [CostAccount] ON CostAccount.[Id] = [MstItem].[CostAccountId] INNER JOIN [MstSupplier] AS [Supplier] ON [Supplier].[Id] = [MstItem].[DefaultSupplierId] INNER JOIN [MstTax] AS [InTax] ON [InTax].[Id] = [MstItem].[InTaxId] INNER JOIN [MstTax] AS [OutTax] ON [OutTax].[Id] = [MstItem].[OutTaxId] INNER JOIN [MstUnit] AS [Unit] ON Unit.[Id] = [MstItem].[UnitId] INNER JOIN [MstUser] AS [EntryUser] ON [EntryUser].[Id] = [MstItem].[EntryUserId] LEFT JOIN [MstUser] AS [UpdateUser] ON [UpdateUser].[Id] = [MstItem].[UpdateUserId] WHERE [MstItem].[Id] = @Id

q0ix016: SELECT [MstItem].[DefaultKitchenReport] FROM [MstItem] GROUP BY [MstItem].[DefaultKitchenReport] HAVING [MstItem].[DefaultKitchenReport] IS NOT NULL ORDER BY [MstItem].[DefaultKitchenReport]

q0ipx07: SELECT [Id] FROM [MstItemPrice] WHERE [Id] <> @Id AND ([ItemId] = @ItemId AND [PriceDescription] = @PriceDescription AND [Price] = @Price AND [TriggerQuantity] = @TriggerQuantity)

[DisbursementApprovedBy].[ApprovedBy] = [MstUser].[Id] LEFT JOIN [TrnPurchaseOrder] AS [PurchaseOrderPreparedBy] ON [PurchaseOrderPreparedBy].[PreparedBy] = [MstUser].[Id] LEFT JOIN [TrnPurchaseOrder] [StockInApprovedBy] ON [StockInApprovedBy].[ApprovedBy] = [MstUser].[Id] LEFT JOIN [TrnStockOut] AS [StockOutPreparedBy] ON [StockOutPreparedBy].[PreparedBy] = [MstUser].[Id] LEFT JOIN [TrnStockOut] AS [StockOutCheckedBy] ON [StockOutCheckedBy].[CheckedBy] = [MstUser].[Id] LEFT JOIN [TrnStockOut] AS [StockOutApprovedBy] ON [StockOutApprovedBy].[ApprovedBy] = [MstUser].[Id] LEFT JOIN q0tcx01: SELECT [TrnCollection].[Id], CONVERT(varchar, TrnCollection.CollectionDate, 101) AS [CollectionDate], [TrnCollection].[CollectionNumber], [TrnSales].[SalesNumber], [MstTerminal].[Terminal], [MstCustomer].[Customer], [TrnCollection].[Amount] AS [Amount], [TrnCollection].[IsLocked], [TrnCollection].[IsCancelled] FROM [TrnCollection] INNER JOIN [MstTerminal] ON [TrnCollection].[TerminalId] = [MstTerminal].[Id] INNER JOIN [MstCustomer] ON [TrnCollection].[CustomerId] = [MstCustomer].[Id] LEFT JOIN [TrnSales] ON [TrnCollection].[SalesId] = [TrnSales].[Id]
q0tcx02: SELECT [TrnCollection].[Id] ,[TrnCollection].[PeriodId] ,[TrnCollection].[CollectionDate] ,[TrnCollection].[CollectionNumber] ,[TrnCollection].[TerminalId] ,[MstTerminal].[Terminal] ,[TrnCollection].[ManualORNumber] ,[TrnCollection].[CustomerId] ,[MstCustomer].[Customer] ,[TrnCollection].[Remarks] ,[TrnCollection].[SalesId] ,[TrnSales].[SalesNumber] ,[TrnCollection].[SalesBalanceAmount] ,[TrnCollection].[Amount] ,[TrnCollection].[TenderAmount] ,[TrnCollection].[ChangeAmount] ,[TrnCollection].[PreparedBy] ,[PreparedBy].[FullName] AS [PreparedByName] ,[TrnCollection].[CheckedBy] ,[CheckedBy].[FullName] AS [CheckedByName] ,[TrnCollection].[ApprovedBy] ,[ApprovedBy].[FullName] AS [ApprovedByName] ,[TrnCollection].[IsCancelled] ,[TrnCollection].[IsLocked] ,[EntryUser].[FullName] AS [EntryUser] ,[TrnCollection].[EntryDateTime] ,[UpdateUser].[FullName] AS [UpdateUser],[TrnCollection].[UpdateDateTime] ,[TrnCollection].[PostCode] FROM [TrnCollection] INNER JOIN [MstTerminal] On [MstTerminal].[Id] = [TrnCollection].[TerminalId] INNER JOIN [MstCustomer] On [MstCustomer].[Id] = [TrnCollection].[CustomerId] INNER JOIN [TrnSales] On [TrnSales].[Id] = [TrnCollection].[SalesId] INNER JOIN [MstUser] AS [PreparedBy] ON [PreparedBy].[Id] = [TrnCollection].[PreparedBy] INNER JOIN [MstUser] AS [CheckedBy] ON [CheckedBy].[Id] = [TrnCollection].[CheckedBy] INNER JOIN [MstUser] AS [ApprovedBy] ON [ApprovedBy].[Id] = [TrnCollection].[ApprovedBy] INNER JOIN [MstUser] AS EntryUser ON EntryUser.[Id] = [TrnCollection].[EntryUserId] LEFT JOIN [MstUser] AS UpdateUser ON UpdateUser.[Id] = [TrnCollection].[UpdateUserId] WHERE [TrnCollection].[Id] = @Id
